title: What is the interpretation of a dream about cutting someone else’s hair according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cutting someone else’s hair: If you see that you are cutting someone else’s hair in your vision and that person is experiencing great happiness because of the beautiful shape of his hair and his appearance that has emerged, you will feel happy, but if you see that the person’s appearance changes for the worse by cutting his hair, you will be very upset. What are the interpretations? What is the possible interpretation of a dream about cutting someone else’s hair? We highlight them throughout our topic. Interpretation of a dream about cutting someone else’s hair. There are many signs that can be interpreted as a dream about cutting someone else’s hair. If the sleeper finds that he is doing this, it becomes clear to him that he accepts the help of those around him with a sincere heart and his love of seeing those around him in constant happiness and harmony, and moreover, he is very happy if someone is there. Those around him take care of him and provide him with support and assistance. There are wonderful events that occur in the life of the sleeper next to the other person, cutting his hair and changing his appearance for the better, as the interpretation becomes hopeful for the departure of many sorrows and worries and the avoidance of disputes and everything that takes away from them. Joy from human life. When a person who cuts his hair suffers from a hardship in life that has led him into debt, his financial condition stabilizes and he accepts to spend his debt and enjoys comfort and joy after that. Jurists associate this dream with a second dream. issue. It is a person’s desire to travel if God calls for a special opportunity for him and expects it soon. Interpretation of a dream about cutting someone else’s hair by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets cutting someone else’s hair in a dream that there is a good relationship between the dreamer and him and that the dreamer will support him in something such as finding a new job or searching for a job. An opportunity to travel where his dreams are elsewhere. To find a good job and earn halal money. Ibn Sirin claims that the appearance resulting from shaving expresses some of the signs of that person, that his life would be better if it was beautiful, but if the hair had a bad appearance, annoying things around him would multiply. An indication of his falling into a financial crisis resulting from the sleeper being robbed and taking his money or some of his valuable possessions. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, Google’s online dream interpretation, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream about cutting someone else’s hair for single peopleWhen a girl By cutting the hair of another girl who suffers from damaged hair and helping her remove it, the interpretation can be seen as being related to her helping a friend, sharing her concerns and working together to find a solution for her, and from here it becomes. It is clear that she has a kind and loving heart. However, if an unmarried woman cuts the hair of someone known to her and she becomes upset, disturbed, and happy about that, then the interpretation may indicate that she has been exposed to negative and bad feelings from this person and wants to take them. Directly from him, and thus she sees this dream as if she is punishing him for what he did to her. Interpretation of a dream about cutting someone else’s hair for a married woman: When a married woman discovers that she is cutting one of her sons’ hair because it is unclean or damaged and his condition changes for the better, it becomes clear that there are certain issues related to the son’s life and the problems that befall him And they stand ready. By his side in difficult times and removes what bothers him. Whoever sees herself cutting her husband’s hair, and becoming beautiful and looking good after the solution.

Interpretation of dreams about my father-in-law harassing me in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing harassment in a dream could be a sign of disobedience, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees harassment in a dream, it may mean that he is committing sins, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees harassment, she could It leads to immorality, and God knows all the unseen. Interpretation of dreams about my brother-in-law I like in a dream Interpretation of a dream about my brother-in-law I like in a dream and can lead to committing sins, and God is All-Knowing If a married woman sees in a dream her husband’s brother-in-law admiring her, this may be an indication of sins, and God knows best. The unseen. When you see your sister’s husband admiring you in a dream, this may be a sign that you are on the wrong path and that God is Most High and Most Knowing. Likewise, the husband’s brother’s admiration for a woman may express the woman’s distance from righteousness and God knows everything that he does not see. Interpretation of a dream about the dead who are harassed by those who live in A dream: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person harassing a living person in a dream could be a sign that he is sleeping on people, and God knows the unseen. When a dreamer sees a dead person mistreating him, this may lead to bad deeds that he performs and he must return, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees an unknown dead person mistreating him, This may indicate that he is going through a difficult problem and that God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about adultery in a mosque in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about adultery in a mosque in a dream could be a sign of shortcomings in religious matters, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees adultery in a mosque in a dream, this may indicate bad friends. And God knows everything. When you see prostitution in the mosque in a dream, it may indicate that you are committing sins, and God knows the unseen. If a young man sees adultery in the mosque in a dream, this may lead to the need to repent, and God is All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of rejecting adultery in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of rejecting Adultery in a dream can be a sign of positive changes, and God knows all that is not seen. If a married woman sees a rejection of adultery, this may lead to her being close to God, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees a rejection of adultery in a dream, this may indicate distance from sin, and God knows best. The unseen. If the dreamer sees rejecting adultery in a dream, it may be evidence of sustenance, and God knows best. The unseen. Interpretation of a dream of rejecting disobedience in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of rejecting disobedience in a dream could be a sign of faith and God has all knowledge. If a married woman sees rejecting sin, this may lead to fear of God. And faith, and God has all knowledge of the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees a refusal to disobey in a dream, this may indicate repentance for sins, and God knows best. When she sees a married man refusing to disobey in a dream, this may indicate repentance and abandonment of sins.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing whole food in a dream and its meaning for a single, married, or pregnant woman?

preview.html: The Trend website offers you an interpretation of seeing food in a dream complete, and many of us can see food in a dream completely, and what is the interpretation of seeing greedy food different from the usual meal in a dream and its interpretation. Offering someone food in a dream is completely different from eating it, and from these articles you will learn why I dream of eating with one of his family members and the complete interpretation of food in a dream for singles and married people, the interpretation of the dream about it. Eating with someone you love, from the hands of the great scholars who interpret visions and dreams in this world, and eating in a dream full of loneliness gives many signs, which you will learn about from this article. What does food dream about in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, says that the interpretation of delicious food in The dream is complete, which indicates a change in the dreamer’s life. The presence of hot or burnt food in the dream indicates problems that the dreamer must go through, and God knows best. When the dreamer sees himself eating spoiled food and is unable to chew or swallow it, this is a sign that he is suffering from An illness, God forbid. Seeing a whole beef in a dream indicates goodness and a lot of nutrition in the dreamer’s life. And when a person in a dream brings food to a sick person, this indicates that he is in good health. See also: Why does a dining room dream in a dream? Eating in a dream is complete for individuals. It is said That when a woman generally sees herself in a dream eating completely in mourning, this indicates that something bad will affect her. And if she sees food in a dream full of joy, and she eats it and eats from it, then this heralds goodness for her, and imminent food, and imminent marriage, and God knows best. Feeding an unmarried woman in a dream full of food - this indicates that she will marry a generous man, and God knows best. See also: Why dream of seeing a pot in a dreamWhy dream of food in a full dream of a married woman They say that eating in a married woman’s dream is a sign of problems between her and her husband that could Interfering in her life, and God knows best. Also, for a married woman to see in a dream full of food, the table is full of food, this is a sign of the food and kindness that she will receive soon, but God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of seeing salt in a dream in full? Why do you dream of food in a pregnant woman’s dream? When a woman sees The pregnant woman herself is full in a dream while eating food, this means that she will give birth easily. And when the pregnant woman in a dream eats all the food that is beautiful and delicious, that is, this indicates kindness, food and money, and God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of seeing a full bowler hat in a dream? Why do you dream With food for a man, it is indicated that whoever sees himself in a dream full and eating greedily attests to the dreamer’s interest in his facial features and the speed of his wants and desires. And when he sees that he is drinking air, this means that he is an organized person and can always manage and arrange his life. And when he sees how he eats everything in a dream and refuses to eat it or Tasting it indicates that opportunities will be available to him and will be lost because he does not think about making his decisions in life, and God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of a ball in a dream?

title: Interpretation of seeing money given to a single woman in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of giving money to a single woman in a dreamGiving money to a single woman in a dream Donating money in a dream is one of the things that many people are exposed to that makes the dreamer feel anxious and can indicate good or perhaps undesirable things. Some dream interpretation scholars have narrated many opinions regarding seeing it in a dream, whether for a man or a woman, and in the following lines we will learn about the best meanings derived from seeing it. Interpretation of receiving money for single women in a dream. If you have a dream and do not find its interpretation, go to Google and type an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. It is considered Money in a dream is an unwanted thing, which indicates that she faces some difficulties and problems in the life of an unmarried girl, and many scholars have seen this. And when she sees that someone has given her a bunch of it, it means that this person is the cause of many problems. For her or that bad news comes to her through this man. But if she sees that there is a young man who gave her a set of bills, this is evidence that the date of her marriage or engagement is approaching in the coming period, because the cards bring her kindness, luck, living and ease. Matters: Giving coins in a dream: If a girl sees that someone gave her a set of coins, this is evidence of the differences between them, and some say that it is bad talk spoken about the fortuneteller by that person, and that he represents love in front of her, but he speaks ill of her in her absence. And when she sees a lot And someone offers it to her, but she did not receive it in the dream, and merely looked at it. This is evidence of the approach to achieving desires and ambitions, acquiring wealth and accumulating money and wealth, especially if it is paper money. Interpretation of finding money for single women in a dream, and when an unmarried woman sees that she has found a large amount of them On her way without anyone giving it to her, this symbolizes the presence of problems, obstacles and difficulties that she faces in her life in general, especially in the field of work, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Dreaming of giving gold, and if a handsome young man gives her a happy appearance with this gift made of gold, then it is a symbol of marriage to a man He is wealthy, has a lot of justice and good morals, and that her life is different and will turn good with him, God willing.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about getting engaged to a girl?

preview.html: I dream of a groom proposing to a girl. Psychologists and energy scientists point out that these dreams are just a reflection of feelings stored in the subconscious, so some girls often see in a dream someone proposes to her and then kidnaps her on his white horse and she lives a happy life with him as she dreamed. Throughout her life, so let us examine with you in detail in the following lines the interpretation of a dream about a groom who proposes to marry a girl according to different interpretation scholars. A dream about a groom who proposes to a girl: Of course, marriage is a transition to another life that is completely different from the life of singleness, so when you dream that a groom proposes to a girl To propose to a girl he does not know, this is a sign that you are entering a new stage in life, either from within. In terms of study, you may obtain a free scholarship to complete your studies abroad, or in terms of work, where you can find a prestigious job that suits you and with an attractive salary. Interpretation of a dream about someone marrying a single man: If marriage occurs in a dream, this indicates the completion of this stage and success in it, and if If a dispute arose or the engagement was cancelled, this means that you are facing problems or disagreements with your life partner or with some managers. Or employers in the work sector, and it may also indicate exposure to certain financial crises that lead to the accumulation of debt. Confused and cannot find an explanation that reassures you? Search on Google for the Egyptian dream interpretation website. Interpretation of a dream about a groom for a single girl: If he sees a groom in a dream and proposes marriage to a single girl in a dream, this can have many meanings. He sees it because of her desire to have intercourse and her inability to find a life partner to complement her. And with him. Starting a family later, or this dream is good news for her that there is a good man to propose to her in the current period. Interpretation of a dream that the groom proposes to me, and if she is already engaged, this may mean that she has gone through some problems and arguments with her parents or her fiancé due to marriage, but soon these differences will disappear and it will become Marriage is in good condition. Interpretation of a dream about a groom for a married woman: If a married woman is the one who sees it, this means that she will give birth, and she is pregnant with a male child, and this affects her psychological state and makes her see a dream about a groom in a dream, or that she is going through a period of disagreements and problems between her and her husband. Which prompts her to think about divorce and marrying another person. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced or widowed woman’s son-in-law: Whereas if the woman is divorced or widowed and sees this dream, it may mean that she wants to marry a good man who will bear responsibility for the children with her or be the best support for her in The future, and it may also mean someone is approaching her and she feels confused and unable to make a decision. Sources:- 1- The Book of Selected Words in the Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad Ibn Sirin, Dar al-Ma’rifa, Beirut 2000. 2- The Dictionary of the Interpretation of Dreams, Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Abdul Al-Ghani Al-Nabulsi, researched by Basil Breidi. Al Safa Library, Abu Dhabi 2008. 3- The book of perfumes of dreams as an expression of a dream, Sheikh Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi. If you see the groom in your dream and do not know the interpretation, I advise you to watch this video!

title: A bed in a dream for a married woman, a single woman, and a pregnant woman as well

preview.html: Hello and welcome again to the Dream Interpretation website. Today we meet the dream of a bed or seeing a bed in a dream as stated in the interpretation of the scholar Sheikh Muhammad Ibn Sirin. The bed in a dream, the interpretation of Muhammad Ibn Sirin. The bed in the interpretation indicates everything that a person walks on, and for a single person it is the wife. If he sits on it, for a married man it is an obedient and loyal wife, if the bed mattress is clean and beautiful. For a tired wife, if the bed linen is dirty and untidy, and his bed is broken or falling apart in the dream, and his affairs are dispersed and his good deeds are gone, such as dismissal from work, dismissal from work, or separation from the family. The wife, whether through divorce, death, abandonment, or travel. It was said that if the bed is disorganized, untidy, or uncomfortable, then this is a warning of a nearby illness, but if it is white, clean, and tidy, then this means a change at work or at home soon. Interpretation of a bed in a dream for honor A bed in a dream for honor B indicates marriage and it is A symbol of the man, partner, or groom. The white bed in the dream of Al-Baha b. The groom whose profession is noble. Interpretation of the bed in a pregnant woman’s dream: As for a pregnant woman seeing a bed in a dream or sitting on the bed, this is a sign of the presence of a male child if the bed is narrow, while a wide bed is a sign of the presence of a female child, God willing. Interpretation of the bed in a married woman’s dream. The bed that A married woman seeing it in her dream symbolizes her status with her husband. It indicates the presence of a problem. Interpretation of a white bed in a dream: A white bed in a dream is a sign of calm and peace of mind, and it is for the fiancé or her brother-in-law, and for the married woman, it shows her distinguished status with her husband. Sitting on a white bed is calm and healing, and sleeping on a white bed is happiness and contentment. Interpretation of sitting on a bed in a dream: As for someone who sees in his dream that he is sitting on a bed, if he is unmarried, he will get married, and if he is married, he will give birth to a boy, and sitting on the bed is a comfort for living. In a dream, it represents an important discovery of life and its joys. Interpretation of a dream of sleeping in a bed with a familiar personIf one dreams that he is sleeping with someone he knows in the same bed, this indicates kinship, sharing, or common inheritance. Interpretation of a dream of sleeping in a bed with a strangerIf you see in your dream that you are sleeping With someone you do not know in the same bed, this is a sign of travel and estrangement, and most scholars interpret this dream as a long life and abundance of food. In conclusion, I thank you, dear reader, for visiting this site and please write a comment if you have any questions or comments. I wish you all the best. And success.

title: Interpretation of seeing a leg of lamb or chicken in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a leg of lamb or chicken in a dream. Lamb or chicken is a delicious meat that is accepted by many and is characterized by its richness in proteins that build the body. Seeing it in a dream shows goodness and money if it is ripe, and if it is raw, this indicates anxiety, sadness, and listening to sad news, and we will explain in this article. Interpretation of seeing a leg of lamb or chicken in a dream. A leg of lamb or chicken in the dream of an unmarried young man, a married man, or a woman, whether she is single, married, pregnant, or a widow, as well as for a divorced woman. This is done by providing interpretations by senior imams of interpretation. In visions and dreams, such as Imam Muhammad Ibn Sirin, past and present, follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of seeing a leg of a sheep or a chicken in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin? Seeing roasted lamb and mutton indicates receiving money in fatigue and hardship. Seeing roasted beef indicates a year of fertility and nourishment. Seeing a roasted boy indicates that he has reached the number of men. Seeing a skinned corpse indicates bad luck. Seeing a boiled and cooked corpse indicates feeding strangers. If the sacrifice is fat, it It indicates the benefit and goodness of these people, and if the sacrifice is poor, it indicates the lack of benefit and poverty of these people. Seeing a fat corpse It indicates the legacy of the dead. Seeing a boiled corpse They are upset. What is the interpretation of lamb meat in a dream? Seeing him eating raw lamb indicates illness and fatigue. Seeing Cooked lamb indicates the fulfillment of dreams and aspirations, but after hard work and effort. Buying lamb shows many problems and fears. Seeing the sale of sheep indicates a major misfortune or scandal. What is the interpretation of a dream about meat in the refrigerator for a married woman? Seeing a fresh meat market announces the pregnancy of a married woman. Seeing you eating raw meat indicates material losses, words of misdeeds and gossip. Seeing tender meat indicates the death of a close person. Seeing goat meat means getting a lot of money. Seeing raw meat in the refrigerator expresses a lot of worries and sorrows. What is the interpretation of a dream about washing meat? Seeing meat Raw, cut and washed, denotes evil and disease. Seeing a large, fat, but immature lamb denotes obtaining an inheritance from the past, with fatigue and trouble, and if the sheep is emaciated and weak, it will not inherit, and shows evil. What is the interpretation of a dream about eating cooked lamb? Seeing cooked meat In a dream for a single woman, it indicates the achievement of goals and the beginning of a new, better life. Knowing how to cook lamb at home indicates material losses. What is the interpretation of a dream about raw meat at home? Seeing eating raw meat indicates backbiting, gossip, evil, and calamity. Seeing raw meat at home is It indicates family disputes and enmity, and it may indicate that you are hearing painful and sad news. We are happy to see the reception of your dreams about “interpretation of seeing lamb or chicken leg” through the comments and the dream team will interpret your dream, answer and communicate with you.

title: Interpretation of seeing the number 49 in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a man

preview.html: Therefore, we will discuss through this article to talk about the interpretation of the appearance of the number 49 in a dream for single and married women and men. The interpretation of seeing the number 49 in a dream for a single girl. The interpretation of the appearance of the number 49 in a dream in general for a single girl. It is one of the visions that indicates a very strong friendship and friendship relationship between these The girl and her other friends in general. About repeatedly seeing the number 49 in a dream for a single girl. This vision is a sign of expanding this girl’s livelihood in the coming period, whether through a new job or an additional source of income. Watching the number 49 shine in the sky during the single girl’s dream. This is a sign that this girl will enjoy many happy moments in a row and will be very satisfied and confident in herself. See also: Interpretation of dreams about numbers in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing the number 49 in a dream for a married man. About seeing the number 49 in a dream for a married man in general during his dream. It indicates This vision indicates that this person will join a very special job that will give him many privileges that he has been looking for since the beginning of his career. When a married man sees the number 49 appear in his house during his dream. This vision is a sign of sufficient peace of mind that this person feels in His family life. He was able to create an ideal family in every way. As for seeing a married man writing the number 49 more than once during his sleep, it is evidence of the wealthy financial situation in which this person lives. And that he is able to reach what he wants in an easy way without any trouble or misery. He may Be interested: Interpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dreamInterpretation of seeing the number 49 in a dream for a married womanWhen a married woman sees the number 49 in a dream in general during her sleep. This vision is evidence that this woman devotes most of her life to being able to create a distinguished family and is very interested in the nature of the conditions of all its members. Her family. About seeing the number 49 written on the body of a married woman during her sleep. This is a sign that this woman will get rid of the psychological problems that she suffers from due to some of the pressures of life, the most important of which is the financial aspect. The number 49 appears more than once in the dream of a married woman during her dreams. It is A testimony to the great happiness that this woman lives and enjoys all aspects of life very well without suffering from bad luck or anything like that. Interpretation of seeing the number 49 in a dream for a pregnant woman. The appearance of the number 49 in a pregnant woman’s dream in general during her dream. It is one of the visions that It carries many beneficial and happy connotations for this woman. In most rumors and interpretations, it indicates the comfort of pregnancy and the absence of any difficulties. Seeing the number 49 appearing in the sky during a pregnant woman’s dream. This is strong evidence that this woman is thinking about her pregnancy in an abnormal way and has a great sense of fear. From the birth process in general due to the previous experiences of some of her close friends. As for seeing the number 49 appear in the home of a pregnant woman during her sleep. Among the dreams that indicate sustenance, abundance of money and health, the god carries the number 49 B

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a green dress in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a green dress in a dream, especially since the colors in the dream carry many different meanings from one color to another, and also based on what is seen in the dream, and perhaps among them is the green color, which brings comfort and psychological peace to the soul. Visions depending on the condition of the person who saw it, and based on Accordingly, we will get to know you in an article about the interpretation of a dream about seeing a green dress in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a green dress in a dream. It should be noted that the color green in a dream in general has a group of positive meanings that have been explained by scholars and experts in dream interpretation, and during this paragraph we will explain to you. Interpretation of a dream Seeing a green dress in a dream is also: It is worth noting that the green dress in the dream is the dress of the people of Paradise. Accordingly, seeing it is mostly beneficial for the pioneer. In addition, the green dress in the dream is a sign of happiness and the fulfillment of desires. Also, seeing clothes Green in a dream is generally a sign of piety and faith in God. A green dress, seeing it in a dream, is evidence of prosperity and marriage. Also, the green color in general in a dream is a sign of psychological stability. Whereas if someone sees a green bed in a dream, this is evidence On the integrity of his religion. If a man sees a green dress in a dream, this indicates marriage to a girl who has a good reputation. This girl performs the duties of religion. Likewise, a loose green dress in a dream is a sign of good character. It indicates that you treat others with good faith. See also: Diamonds in a dream and the interpretation of seeing diamonds in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a green dress for a single woman. Seeing this dress varies in its connotations based on the social status of the person who saw the dream. During these lines, we will explain to you the interpretation of a dream about wearing a green dress for a single woman. It is also: If an unmarried girl sees in Dreaming that she is wearing green robes. It is considered a good omen, and good news. As if the woman’s body is completely covered by the dress, this is evidence that she will live a life close to God Almighty. It also suggests that she is a righteous girl who does what God commands her to do and stays away from what he forbids us. In addition to that Seeing one girl wearing a green dress in a dream. This is evidence that her luck will be good at work as well as with her family and in her studies if she is still in the stages of study. See also: Interpretation of a dream to see walking and walking in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a green dress in a dream for a married woman when Seeing a married woman in a dream, a green dress contains many good positive connotations, which give the soul confidence and comfort, and we will explain during this paragraph the interpretation of the green dress in a dream for a married woman is also: If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband gave her a gift, and it was a short green dress. His appearance was calm and he had some beautiful drawings. This indicates that the life of this wise woman is a peaceful life with a lot of understanding between her and her husband, and God knows best. If a married woman sees that she wants

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about white onions in a dream in different situations. Onions are one of the essential vegetables in the home. There is almost no home without the presence of onions. It is a necessary and essential element in every meal that is prepared, and therefore in order to see onions in a dream, it must have many interpretations and explanations. That is why we present to you, through today’s article on the encyclopedia website, we show you more details. Seeing white onions in a dream: The great scholar and great translator Ibn Sirin believes that seeing onions in a dream is a sign of kindness, nourishment, and money for the fortuneteller, but white onions in a dream are sometimes considered a vision. Unpleasant, because it can be a sign of sadness. Concern comes down to the priest, as the dreamer may suffer from many problems, face serious financial crises, or lose his money. For someone who finds white onions in a dream, this is a sign of his arrogance and arrogance. A pregnant woman is considered vulnerable to a false pregnancy, God forbid, and white onions, in the opinion of Ibn Sirin, can indicate feelings of hatred and envy that the viewer is exposed to or that it is transmitted to other people and a white vision. Onions in a dream can vary depending on the situation in which the fortuneteller finds planting white onions different from peeling. Planting white onions in a dream: Planting in general in a dream is a sign of goodness, because cultivation in reality is good and sustenance for its owner. Of the money behind his trade and cultivation of white onions In a dream, it could be a sign that money will come to him, either through inheritance or work, as it may indicate the provision of a righteous heir, God willing. If an unmarried person finds himself planting white onions in a dream, this is good news that God Almighty will marry, and the husband will be Or a wife who has ideal principles and values. Chopping white onions in a dream: Seeing a single girl cutting white onions in a dream is a sign that she will be able to overcome the problems and misfortunes she is exposed to and move her to happiness and joy. Seeing chopped white onions for a single woman could be A sign of marriage soon, God willing. As for a married woman who sees herself cutting white onions in a dream, this is an indication that she will be blessed with tremendous goodness, either success at work, happiness in married life, and staying away from quarrels and problems, or that she will soon have. Good offspring, God willing. For a pregnant woman who sees in her dream that she is cutting white onions into small pieces, this is good news that she will give birth easily and conveniently, and her fetus will be the apple of her eye, God willing. A sign that she will be exposed to some sad news, her pregnancy may be false or she will be exposed to some troubles and problems, and perhaps a difficult birth. Cutting a white onion in a man’s dream is a sign of food and money that he will earn soon and it may be a sign of a good boy. Buying a white onion in a dream: Scholars and interpreters differ in the interpretation of this dream, as some interpreters say that buying white onions in a dream is a sign of evil, evil, and entering
